title: Ticket #2308: switchboard goes into infinite loop when starting procd
description: When privsep is enabled and the master has an environment variable containing a newline, the privsep switchboard goes into an infinite loop when starting the procd, which effectively prevents condor from starting up. We observed this on a Scientific Linux 6.0 system, because of the environment variable G_BROKEN_FILENAMES.
